Mr. Guy Lowell--2

iar with his later accomplishments.

As I have already said, I am personally interested in the

case, and have told Kwan that I would take up the cuágel in his behalf. In 
thinking of places where he would find the right ideals and come under the 
best influences my thoughts naturally turned to you and your office. of 
course if you have no openings for a follow of this type, thero is nothing

Purther to ba said.

I hopo, however, that you will find it possible to

give him a chanco. |

Fery sincomoiy yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter asking about possible job openings in Lowell's architectural practice, recommending Kwan as exceptionally able and very interested in any kind of an opening." (Page 2)""etter asking about possible job o"
